home.phase-1: Hey there, It's Yuchun here. First of all, thank you for stopping by. It's important for me to properly document my life and career journey, allowing me to reflect on my growth. That's why I created this website. From UI design to coding, everything you see here is the result of my hard work.
home.phase-2: I used to work as an urban planner and architect, but now I'm a software engineer at an e-commerce company, mainly focusing on frontend development. While frontend is my specialty, I'm also actively learning full-stack skills to broaden my professional knowledge and ability.
home.phase-3: Currently, the website primarily showcases some coding-related projects, but I also plan to incorporate some content related to architecture and urban planning in the future, as both are crucial aspects of my life. Wish you can feel my passion and professionalism while exploring the website. Enjoy your browsing!

keyFeatures.desc-1: Two-Step Verification - Secure login with Google Authenticator to protect against unauthorized access.
keyFeatures.desc-2: Enhanced Login System - Utilizes a combination of identification numbers, usernames, passwords, and reCAPTCHA to enhance security against automated attacks.
keyFeatures.desc-3: Financial Account Management - Provides capabilities to manage, add, edit, and delete financial institution accounts, accommodating multiple banks and branches.
keyFeatures.desc-4: Transaction Handling - Features advanced tools for transaction management and querying, including extensive filters for date, payment method, and status, complemented by a dedicated refund management system.
keyFeatures.desc-5: Financial Monitoring - Displays detailed views of credit card transaction limits and offers a broad overview of financial operations to help users manage their accounts effectively.
keyFeatures.desc-6: Batch Job Management - Enables users to monitor and manage batch processing jobs with options to view job status, type, and access detailed summaries.
keyFeatures.desc-7: Withdrawal and Deposit Operations - Supports withdrawal operations with detailed information on timelines and transaction limits, alongside functionalities for setting up and managing financial accounts for deposits.
keyFeatures.desc-8: Security and Permissions Management - Manages user permissions through customizable groups, enhancing system security and operational efficiency with detailed access controls.
keyFeatures.desc-9: User Account Management - Offers a robust platform for user management, including options to add, edit, and disable users, and manage authentication and group permissions effectively.
keyFeatures.desc-10: Data Handling and Export - Provides sophisticated accounting query capabilities and secure data export options, requiring password verification for enhanced data protection.

keyFeatures.desc-1: Diversion Group Management - Allows administrators to set rules based on payment methods, installment types, and bank preferences, providing flexible control over transaction processing.
keyFeatures.desc-2: Payment Diversion - Enhances payment processing customization through configurable diversion rules based on specific business rules and banking conditions.
keyFeatures.desc-3: Exception Management - Manages exceptions for acquiring banks, ensuring continuous transaction processing without disruptions caused by anomalies.
keyFeatures.desc-4: Verification Inquiries - Facilitates the verification and review of transactions and settlements, helping to resolve disputes and maintain transaction integrity.
keyFeatures.desc-5: Remittance Record Inquiry - Tracks remittance records with detailed transaction information, including creation dates, status, and actual amounts, along with functionalities for result uploads.
keyFeatures.desc-6: Group Permissions and Announcement Management - Enables precise configuration of user group permissions and effective communication within the platform through the management of system-wide announcements.
keyFeatures.desc-7: User Management - Offers robust tools for managing user accounts, including enabling, disabling, and editing user details to ensure comprehensive access control.
keyFeatures.desc-8: Transaction Handling - Provides detailed functionalities for managing and querying transactions with extensive filtering options to enhance auditing and monitoring processes.
keyFeatures.desc-9: Report Management - Enables the generation and download of various financial reports, such as store balance and accounting reports, customizable by specific time intervals.
keyFeatures.desc-10: Accounting and Financial Reports - Supports detailed inquiries into financial transactions, allowing users to track, review, and export transaction data for in-depth analysis.

keyFeatures.desc-1: Streamlined Payment Process - Provides clear, user-friendly input fields for entering essential information such as email and contact details.
keyFeatures.desc-2: Multiple Payment Options - Includes full credit card payments and installments, offering flexibility to users.
keyFeatures.desc-3: Transaction Summary - Displays comprehensive purchase details including item descriptions, pricing, and total amounts, enhancing transparency.
keyFeatures.desc-4: Security Features - Integrates credit card CVV input to prevent fraud and ensure transaction security.
keyFeatures.desc-5: Real-Time Payment Verification - Verifies payment information in real-time, reducing errors and guiding users throughout the payment process.
keyFeatures.desc-6: Immediate Transaction Feedback - Provides instant confirmation of payment statuses including successful, cancelled, and failed payments, along with detailed transaction summaries.
keyFeatures.desc-7: Scam Protection Alerts - Displays warnings to protect users from potential scam messages, enhancing trust and security.
